title: Rescue the Druid Halsin
content:
e kind of animal. could this have been the work of the missing druid Halsin?

Defeat the goblin leaders

We saved a druid named Halsin. He can't heal us, but if we help him defeat the goblin leaders, he may help us find answers at Moonrise Towers. We found the missing druid Halsin. He can't heal us, but if we help him defeat the goblin leaders, he may help us find answers at Moonrise Towers. We killed Dror Ragzlin, the goblin king. We killed Minthara the drow commander.
